snippet: Flooding in Malawi has killed more than 176 people, displaced at least 200,000, left homes and schools submerged in water and washed away roads.
abstract: Flooding in Malawi kills more than 176 people, displaces at least 200,000 and damages or washes away homes, schools and roads.
lead_paragraph: Flooding in Malawi has killed more than 176 people, displaced at least 200,000, left homes and schools submerged in water and washed away roads.

headline.main: Malawi: 176 Killed and Thousands Displaced by Floods
headline.print_headline: Malawi: 176 Killed and Thousands Displaced by Floods
